title: Where To?
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu went to the amusement park with Mama the other day!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I see, good for you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Fufu, Lanzhu showed her around! She was so happy! How about you, Mia? Where would you take your family?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I can’t think of something like that on the spot, you know?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Then you’ve gotta start planning now, so you won’t have to when your family comes here! Lanzhu will help!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Alright, alright. I guess I’ll take them around Odaiba first, I want to show them the school too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Let’s have them meet everyone in the club! Tell them that Lanzhu is the supreme club president!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>No, I don’t think we need to do that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Then, what about afterward?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Maybe a family restaurant.... Baseball stadiums don’t sound that bad either. Then.... Umm....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>You don’t know much about the outside because you’ve always holed up in the club room, Mia.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>T-, that’s not....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>It’s okay, it’s okay! Lanzhu will just need to help show you around! Come on, we’re going out~♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Eeeh!? Wait, I need to compose today.... Okay, I’m going, stop pulling me!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
